subject: Track and Field
lead_paragraph: Justin Gatlin ran the fastest 100 meters of the year and won the 200 an hour later at the Memorial Van Damme in Brussels on Friday to extend his unbeaten streak to 18 races.
snippet: Justin Gatlin ran the fastest 100 meters of the year and won the 200 an hour later at the Memorial Van Damme in Brussels on Friday to extend his unbeaten streak to 18 races.
